sentences.en: Berlin people drank champagne, set off fireworks and tooted their car horns.
sentences.cn: 柏林市民喝香槟、放焰火、鸣车笛。

sentences.en: Between them they drank away every cent.
sentences.cn: 他们俩把身上的钱都喝光了。

sentences.en: He ate little, and drank less.
sentences.cn: 他没吃什么东西，更没喝什么。

sentences.en: He drank and stifled a belch.
He drank his cup of tea.
He drank so much that nothing he had would stay down.
sentences.cn: 他喝的酒太多了，他会把吃的东西全都呕吐出来。

sentences.en: He drank thirstily from the pool under the rock.
sentences.cn: 他饥渴地喝着岩石下水潭中的水。

sentences.en: He drank too much and is paying dearly for it.
sentences.cn: 他现在正为酗酒付出沉重的代价。

sentences.en: He just drank himself into oblivion.
I drank a cup of tea that tasted of diesel.
sentences.cn: 我喝了杯有股柴油味的茶。

sentences.en: Marta drank a glass of juice.
They drank one bottle of wine.
They drank out of chipped mugs.
sentences.cn: 他们用豁了口的杯子喝酒。

sentences.en: They joked and drank coffee and filled themselves with chocolate cake.
sentences.cn: 他们开着玩笑，喝着咖啡，尽情地吃着巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.en: Tony drank some coffee before he continued.
sentences.cn: 托尼喝了点咖啡继续说。

sentences.en: We drank ourselves into a stupor on cheap wine.
sentences.cn: 我们喝廉价葡萄酒喝得酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: When his whisky came he drank half of it in one gulp.
sentences.cn: 威士忌端上来后，他一口气就喝掉了一半。

phrases.tran_cn: 把…一饮而尽；借酒消愁；比酒量使…醉倒
大喝；豪饮；一大口一大口地喝酒
混合鸡尾酒；调好的饮料
n. 软饮料；不含酒精的饮料
n. 喝的东西；一些喝的东西
烈性饮料，高酒精饮料；酒的总称

trans.tran_cn: 喝（酒）( drink的过去式 )，饮，喝酒，（尤指）酗酒
